common.usernameDescription: Usernames are subject to moderation. Do not use special symbols, spaces, or Cyrillic letters.
common.setWithdrawalPin: Set a unique PIN to protect your funds and ensure safe withdrawals.
common.pinMustBeAtLeastDigits: PIN must be at least {{digits}} digits. Please enter a {{digits}}-digit PIN.
common.pinSetUpSuccessfullyDescription: Your new PIN has been set. You can now use it for secure withdrawals.
common.updateWithdrawalPinDescription: Change your PIN to keep your withdrawals secure and up to date.
common.pinMustBeAtLeastDigitsError: PIN must be at least {{digits}} digits. Please enter a {{digits}}-digit PIN.
common.pinDoNotMatch: PIN do not match. Please ensure both fields are identical.
common.documentUploadedSuccessfullyDescription: Your document has been submitted for review. We'll notify you once it's verified.
common.uploadDocumentDescription: To verify your identity, please upload a valid government-issued ID. Ensure the document is clear, valid, and matches your account details.
common.acceptedFormats: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, or PDF (Max size: {{size}}MB).
common.completeMyProfileDescription: Make sure it matches your ID or passport to keep your account secure.
common.thankYouForCompletingYourProfile: Thank you for completing your profile
common.thankYouForCompletingYourProfileDescript: Your profile is now complete and ready to use. Enjoy seamless access to all features!
common.addressVerificationDescription:
Enter your current residential address. 
 You can update it later if needed!
common.submissionSuccessfulDescription: Your address has been submitted. You're now ready for secure transactions and updates.
common.pinUpdatedSuccessfullyDescription: Your new PIN has been set. You can now use it for secure withdrawals.
common.serverError: Server error, please try again later
